FlClash

The official F-Droid repository for FlClash.

Currently it serves 1 apps. To add it to your F-Droid client, scan the QR code (click it to enlarge) or use this URL:

https://txyyh.github.io/fdroid-repo/repo

If you would like to manually verify the fingerprint (SHA-256) of the repository signing key, here it is:
0D 85 A8 B5 25 16 E7 EB 1F D8 C1 67 94 A3 D4 55 0F 81 32 F7 6B A3 D0 F6 1F 8A D7 70 97 46 AB CF
